verses.verse: Now Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Leah, <S%H3812><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> she had borne <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to visit <S%H7200><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

And when Shechem <S%H7927><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> her, he took <S%H3947><s%> her and lay <S%H7901><s%> with her by force. <S%H6031><s%>

And he was deeply <S%H1692><s%> attracted <S%H1692><s%> to Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and he loved <S%H157><s%> the girl <S%H5291><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> tenderly <S%H3820><s%> to her.

So Shechem <S%H7927><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to his father Hamor, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H2544><s%> "Get <S%H559><s%> me this <S%H3947><s%> young <S%H2088><s%> girl <S%H3207><s%> for a wife. <S%H3207><s%>"

Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that he had defiled <S%H2930><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> his daughter; <S%H1323><s%> but his sons <S%H1121><s%> were with his livestock <S%H4735><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> so Jacob <S%H3290><s%> kept <S%H2790><s%> silent <S%H2790><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> in.
Then Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father of Shechem <S%H1><s%> went <S%H7927><s%> out to Jacob <S%H3318><s%> to speak <S%H3290><s%> with him.

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in from the field <S%H7704><s%> when they heard <S%H8085><s%> [it;] and the men <S%H376><s%> were grieved, <S%H6087><s%> and they were very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H2734><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> a disgraceful <S%H5039><s%> thing <S%H5039><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> by lying <S%H7901><s%> with Jacob's daughter, <S%H1323><s%> for such <S%H3651><s%> a thing <S%H3651><s%> ought not to be done. <S%H6213><s%>

But Hamor <S%H2544><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them, saying, <S%H559><s%> "The soul <S%H5315><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> longs <S%H2836><s%> for your daughter; <S%H1323><s%> please <S%H4994><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> her to him in marriage. <S%H802><s%>
"And intermarry <S%H2859><s%> with us; give <S%H5414><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> to us, and take <S%H3947><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> for yourselves.

"Thus you shall live <S%H3427><s%> with us, and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be [open] before <S%H6440><s%> you; live <S%H3427><s%> and trade <S%H5503><s%> in it, and acquire <S%H270><s%> property <S%H270><s%> in it."

Shechem <S%H7927><s%> also said <S%H559><s%> to her father and to her brothers, <S%H1><s%> "If I find <S%H251><s%> favor <S%H4672><s%> in your sight, <S%H2580><s%> then I will give <S%H5869><s%> whatever <S%H5414><s%> you say <S%H834><s%> to me.

"Ask <S%H7235><s%> me ever so <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H3966><s%> bridal <S%H4119><s%> payment <S%H4119><s%> and gift, <S%H4976><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> according as you say <S%H559><s%> to me; but give <S%H5414><s%> me the girl <S%H5291><s%> in marriage. <S%H802><s%>"

But Jacob's sons <S%H1121><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> and his father Hamor, <S%H1><s%> with deceit, <S%H2544><s%> and spoke <S%H4820><s%> to them, because <S%H1696><s%> he had defiled <S%H834><s%> Dinah <S%H2930><s%> their sister. <S%H1783><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> to them, "We cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> our sister <S%H269><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is uncircumcised, <S%H6190><s%> for that would be a disgrace <S%H2781><s%> to us.

"Only <S%H389><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> [condition] will we consent <S%H225><s%> to you: if <S%H518><s%> you will become <S%H1961><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> us, in that every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> of you be circumcised, <S%H4135><s%>

then we will give <S%H5414><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> to you, and we will take <S%H3947><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> for ourselves, and we will live <S%H3427><s%> with you and become <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>
"But if <S%H518><s%> you will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to us to be circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> then we will take <S%H3947><s%> our daughter <S%H1323><s%> and go. <S%H1980><s%>"
Now their words <S%H1697><s%> seemed <S%H3190><s%> reasonable <S%H3190><s%> to Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> Hamor's son. <S%H1121><s%>

And the young <S%H5288><s%> man <S%H5288><s%> did not delay <S%H309><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> the thing, <S%H1697><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he was delighted <S%H2654><s%> with Jacob's daughter. <S%H1323><s%> Now he was more <S%H4480><s%> respected <S%H3513><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the household <S%H1004><s%> of his father.

So Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and his son <S%H1121><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the gate <S%H8179><s%> of their city, <S%H5892><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of their city, <S%H5892><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"These <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> are friendly <S%H8003><s%> with us; therefore let them live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> and trade <S%H5503><s%> in it, for behold, <S%H2009><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is large <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> enough <S%H3027><s%> for them. Let us take <S%H3947><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> in marriage, <S%H802><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> to them.

"Only <S%H389><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> [condition] will the men <S%H376><s%> consent <S%H225><s%> to us to live <S%H3427><s%> with us, to become <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> that every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among us be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> as they are circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

"Will not their livestock <S%H4735><s%> and their property <S%H7075><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their animals <S%H929><s%> be ours? Only <S%H389><s%> let us consent <S%H225><s%> to them, and they will live <S%H3427><s%> with us."

And all <S%H3605><s%> who went <S%H3318><s%> out of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and to his son <S%H1121><s%> Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> was circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who went <S%H3318><s%> out of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city. <S%H5892><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> when they were in pain, <S%H3510><s%> that two <S%H8147><s%> of Jacob's sons, <S%H1121><s%> Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi, <S%H3878><s%> Dinah's brothers, <S%H251><s%> each <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> upon the city <S%H5892><s%> unawares, <S%H983><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male. <S%H2145><s%>

And they killed <S%H2026><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and his son <S%H1121><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> from Shechem's house, <S%H1004><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%>

Jacob's sons <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> upon the slain <S%H2491><s%> and looted <S%H962><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they had defiled <S%H2930><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%>

They took <S%H3947><s%> their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and their herds <S%H1241><s%> and their donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> was in the city <S%H5892><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> was in the field; <S%H7704><s%>

and they captured <S%H7617><s%> and looted <S%H962><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their wealth <S%H2428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their little <S%H2945><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> and their wives, <S%H802><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> that [was] in the houses. <S%H1004><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi, <S%H3878><s%> "You have brought <S%H5916><s%> trouble <S%H5916><s%> on me, by making <S%H887><s%> me odious <S%H887><s%> among the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> among the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites; <S%H6522><s%> and my men <S%H4962><s%> being few <S%H4962><s%> in number, <S%H4557><s%> they will gather <S%H622><s%> together against <S%H5921><s%> me and attack <S%H5221><s%> me and I shall be destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> I and my household. <S%H1004><s%>"
But they said, <S%H559><s%> "Should he treat <S%H6213><s%> our sister <S%H269><s%> as a harlot <S%H2181><s%>?"
